mapper.sql: id, app_id, req_url, get_params, req_ip, post_params, req_method
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_logs WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_logs SET app_id = #{app_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, req_url = #{req_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, get_params = #{get_params, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, req_ip = #{req_ip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_params = #{post_params, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, req_method = #{req_method, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tb_logs WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
